title: Was a Lottery Winner Arrested for Dumping $200,000 of Manure on the Lawn of His Former Boss?
subtitle: When asked by organizers what he would do with the money, he had simply answered: “Just read the news, you’ll see.“
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: A lottery winner was arrested after he spent $200,000 to dump manure on his ex-boss's lawn.
